reason.reasonText: At McDermott Landscaping, we offer our customers a comprehensive range of services to create bespoke and elegant gardens. Our pride lies in the exceptional quality of our craftsmanship, ensuring minimal disturbance to you during our work. We possess expertise in all aspects of computer-aided designs (CAD), available upon request, tailored to meet your specific needs. As fully insured and highly experienced landscape professionals with over 20 years of expertise in landscaping design and construction, we guarantee a seamless, professional experience from concept to completion.

story.storyText: My name is Connor McDermott, and in the 1990s, I embarked on my landscaping journey right after finishing college. After gaining valuable experience with one of Ireland's top landscaping companies, my wife and I used our expertise to establish McDermott Landscaping. Today, McDermott Landscaping stands proudly as a market leader , renowned for our quality work and exceptional service in Westmeath and the greater Leinster area. We offer a comprehensive range of services, ensuring a seamless experience for our clients. With us, you have a single point of contact throughout the entire project, allowing us to bring your vision to life with professionalism and warmth.
